title: Advanced Statistical Methods for Analyzing Empirical Data
text:
Welcome!
This open course introduces postgraduate students to advanced statistical methods used in the quantitative social, educational, and behavioral sciences. Students will learn:

Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) designs.
Simple and multiple linear regression.
Simple and multiple logistic regression.
Factor Analysis.
Mediation and Path Analysis.
Meta-analysis.

The student will also learn about the principles of data visualization and statistical software JAMOVI.
